short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search online for your favourite games and always know if they are available to download at CDKeys.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Install the CDKeys Chrome Extension to get up to date pricing when you surf the web shopping for your favourite PC, Xbox, Nintendo, and PlayStation games. The CDKeys Chrome Extension will check if CDKeys.com has a cheaper listing for the game you are shopping for!
